description: This causes the spawn to fail
title: VMware:  when booting with --ephemeral and we fail to default the adapter_type available from the image.

comments.content: This causes the spawn to fail

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/170054

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/170054
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=2b4fcc594b21dacac77797824fa53ec6756acf52

Branch:    master

commit 2b4fcc594b21dacac77797824fa53ec6756acf52
Author: Gary Kotton <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Apr 2 02:25:43 2015 -0700

    VMware: ensure that the adapter type is used
    
    In the event that the boot was done and the adapter type was not
    passed we should use the default adapter type on the image.
    
    Change-Id: I3bf60e5ea225e394bca67edfd4b0302b80d28019
    Closes-bug: #1439585
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
